osvSchema.details: The Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress plugin before 3.7.3 accepts all zip files and automatically extracts the zip file into a publicly accessible directory without sufficiently validating the extracted file type. This may allows high privilege users such as administrator to upload an executable file type leading to remote code execution.

product_data.product_name: Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress

description_data.value: The Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress plugin before 3.7.3 accepts all zip files and automatically extracts the zip file into a publicly accessible directory without sufficiently validating the extracted file type. This may allows high privilege users such as administrator to upload an executable file type leading to remote code execution.

description.value: CWE-434 Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type

descriptions.value: The Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress plugin before 3.7.3 accepts all zip files and automatically extracts the zip file into a publicly accessible directory without sufficiently validating the extracted file type.
